item.title: Whooping Cough And Mental Health: What You Need To Know
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Have you ever heard of whooping cough? Also known as pertussis, this respiratory infection is highly contagious and can cause lengthy and repeated bouts of coughing. But did you know that whooping cough can also have an impact on mental health? In this article, we will explore what whooping cough is, its impacts on...

item.title: Migraine And Mental Health: Causes, Effects On Health, Symptoms & Treatment

item.title: The Benefits of Meditation: How It Can Improve Your Mental Health
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Meditation is a simple yet powerful technique that has been practiced for centuries in many cultures around the world. It involves sitting in a quiet place, focusing your attention on your breath or a particular object, and letting go of distracting thoughts. Although meditation has traditionally been associated with spiritual practices, recent research has shown...

The post The Benefits of Meditation: How It Can Improve Your Mental Health appeared first on The New Vibes.
